definition: hawthorn tree (rose family, genus Crataegus)/rose hip (hawthorn fruit)
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: The crown form is an important factor which influences the growth and development of the adult hawthorn trees.
sentences.chinese: 樹形是影響成齡山楂樹生長髮育的一個重要因素。

sentences.english: Processing technique of Low Sugar Preserved Hawthorn were studied in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 試驗對低糖山楂涼果的加工工藝進行了研究。

sentences.english: Hawthorn and hawthorn sweetend roll film is the most common and most popular varieties.
sentences.chinese: 山楂片和山楂果丹皮是最普通，最流行的品種。

sentences.english: Hawthorn and hawthorn sweetend roll film is the most common and most popular varieties.
sentences.chinese: 山楂片和山楂果丹皮是最普通，最流行的品種。

sentences.english: A cuckoo began calling from a hawthorn tree .
sentences.chinese: 一隻布穀鳥開始在一株山楂樹裏咕咕地呼叫。

sentences.english: The invention relates to a haw monascus health product comprising haws and monascus raw materials.
sentences.chinese: 一種山楂紅曲保健品，由山楂和紅曲原料製成。

sentences.chinese: 一種山楂紅曲保健品，由山楂和紅曲原料製成。

sentences.english: It's April, and blossom time, and white is the may;
sentences.chinese: 山楂花正白四月裏鮮花怒放。
山楂健脾開胃消食，脂肪。

sentences.english: Right, Hawthorns not only have a great taste, but are also beneficial for your body.
sentences.chinese: 嗯，山楂不但味道好，而且對身體有很多好處。

sentences.english: The farmer is now pleaching the hawthorn and wild plum.
sentences.chinese: 農民正在把山楂樹枝和野柏樹枝編成矮籬笆。

sentences.english: I like it made with Hawthorns the best.
sentences.chinese: 我還是最喜歡喫山楂的。

sentences.english: The present invention relates to acetic beverage brewed with haw fruit and its brewing process.
sentences.chinese: 本發明涉及利用山楂果釀造醋酸飲料及其釀造方法。

sentences.english: " His most recent release is last year's romance "Under the Hawthorn Tree.
sentences.chinese: 他最近的一個作品是上一年的浪漫故事“山楂樹下”。

sentences.english: Goldenchain Tree and Midland Hawthorn are very good ornamental trees.
sentences.chinese: 金鍊花與紅花山楂是觀賞價值很高的觀花喬木。

definition: orange peel/tangerine peel/dried orange peel used in Chinese medicine
